attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ok back in novemeber 2008 i was diagnosed with a lump in my right side of my neck.i was told i would have an operation back in december but it was cancelled and this kept going on I felt like my life was in there hands and none would do anything to help. Was told loads of different things like oh no beds or sorry clerical error. What we need is better run hospitals which helps patients and not reject them
